Class ViewFirstAdmin

java.lang.Object
guiFirstAdmin.ViewFirstAdmin
public class ViewFirstAdmin extends Object

Title: ViewFirstAdmin Class

Description: The FirstAdmin Page View. This class is used to require the very first user of the system to specify an Admin Username and Password when there is no database for the application. This avoids the common weakness practice of hard coding credentials into the application.

  • Method Details

    • displayFirstAdmin

      public static void displayFirstAdmin(javafx.stage.Stage ps)

      Method: public displayFirstAdmin(Stage ps)

      Description: This method is called when the application first starts. It create an an instance of the View class. NOTE: As described below, this code does not implement MVC using the singleton pattern used by most of the pages as the code is written this way because we know with certainty that it will only be called once. For this reason, we directly call the private class constructor.

      Parameters:
      ps - specifies the JavaFX Stage to be used for this GUI and it's methods
